reviewText: Rien a Declarer (Nothing To Declare) could be considered the flip side of Dany Boon's much funnier Bienvenue Chez Les Ch'tis (Welcome to The Sticks).  A similar premise of lampooning supposed differences between two regions.  The target this time, the border of France and Belgium at the dawn of Europe's borderless Schengen Area, rather than northern and southern France.  Yes, there were some very funny moments where I laughed out loud but the story was not even.  I wish some of the minor character roles had been developed more which may have given the film better continuity.  Perhaps they were, but ended up on the cutting room floor?  I did purchase this Region 2 DVD (while traveling in France) to add to my collection.
